name: TestUrlBuilder
description: Unit tests for the UrlBuilder utility class, focusing on URL construction and query parameter joining.

test_cases.name: testBuildFullUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the construction of a full URL with parameters.

test_cases.name: testBuildFullUrlWithoutParams
test_cases.description: Tests the construction of a full URL without parameters.

test_cases.name: testJoinQueryParameters
test_cases.description: Tests the joining of query parameters into a single string.

test_cases.name: testJoinLargeQueryParameters
test_cases.description: Tests the joining of a large set of query parameters into a single string.

test_cases.name: testJoinQueryParametersWithoutParams
test_cases.description: Tests the joining of query parameters when no parameters are provided.

test_cases.name: testJoinQueryParametersWithEmptyParams
test_cases.description: Tests the joining of query parameters when empty parameters are provided.

test_cases.name: testJoinQueryParametersWithLocaleIT
test_cases.description: Tests the joining of query parameters with a specific Locale (IT) to ensure double values are formatted correctly.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the construction of a stream URL with parameters.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWitoutParams
test_cases.description: Tests the construction of a stream URL without parameters.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWithEmptyParams
test_cases.description: Tests the construction of a stream URL with empty parameters.
